unitec.lucas.game

Class GameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • unitec.lucas.game.GameLoop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameLoop
extends SurfaceView
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Main surface view, handle all the game's events.
    Author:
    Yang Zhang (Lucas)

      • run

        public void run()
        Execute the thread, update and draw the background, space craft, thrusters and so on. It refreshes and updates every 20ms.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • moveLeft

        public void moveLeft()
        Called when left button pressed. It checks if it runs out of fuel, if not, change the craft's speed, then draw thruster

      • moveRight

        public void moveRight()
        Called when right button pressed. It checks if it runs out of fuel, if not, change the craft's speed, then draw thruster

      • moveUp

        public void moveUp()
        Called when up button pressed. It checks if it runs out of fuel, if not, change the craft's speed, then draw thruster

                        int[] ycor,
                        double x0,
                        double y0)
        Reference to John Casey's collision detection code Collision detection
        Parameters:
        xcor - Surface array of X coordinate
        ycor - Surface array of Y coordinate
        x0 - Point's X Coordinate
        y0 - Point's Y Coordinate
